verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
See <WH7200>, I have called<WH7121> by name<WH8034> Bezalel<WH1212> the son<WH1121> of Uri<WH221>, the son<WH1121> of Hur<WH2354>, of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah<WH3063>:
and I have filled<WH4390> him with the Spirit<WH7307> of God<WH430>, in wisdom<WH2451>, and in understanding<WH8394>, and in knowledge<WH1847>, and in all manner of workmanship<WH4399>,
to devise<WH2803> skilful works<WH4284>, to work<WH6213> in gold<WH2091>, and in silver<WH3701>, and in brass<WH5178>,
and in cutting<WH2799> of stones<WH68> for setting<WH4390>, and in carving<WH2799> of wood<WH6086>, to work<WH6213> in all manner of workmanship<WH4399>.

And I<WH5414>, behold, I have appointed with him Oholiab<WH171>, the son<WH1121> of Ahisamach<WH294>, of the tribe<WH4294> of Dan<WH1835>; and in the heart<WH3820> of all that are<WH2450> wise-hearted<WH3820> I have put<WH5414> wisdom<WH2451>, that they may make<WH6213> all that I have commanded thee<WH6680>:
the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, and the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715>, and the mercy-seat<WH3727> that is thereupon<WH3627>, and all the furniture of the Tent<WH168>,
and the table<WH7979> and its vessels<WH3627>, and the pure<WH2889> candlestick<WH4501> with all its vessels<WH3627>, and the altar<WH4196> of incense<WH7004>,
and the altar<WH4196> of burnt-offering<WH5930> with all its vessels<WH3627>, and the laver<WH3595> and its base<WH3653>,

and the finely wrought<WH8278> garments<WH899>, and the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> for Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548>, and the garments<WH899> of his sons<WH1121>, to minister in the priest<WH3547>'s office,
and the anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081>, and the incense<WH7004> of sweet<WH5561> spices for the holy<WH6944> place<WH6680>: according to all that I have commanded thee shall they do<WH6213>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> thou also unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, Verily<WH389> ye shall keep<WH8104> my sabbaths<WH7676>: for it is a sign<WH226> between me and you throughout your generations<WH1755>; that ye may know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068> who sanctifieth you<WH6942>.

Ye shall keep<WH8104> the sabbath<WH7676> therefore<WH6944>; for it is holy unto you<WH2490>: every one that profaneth it shall surely<WH4191> be put to death<WH4191>; for whosoever doeth<WH6213> any work<WH4399> therein<WH5315>, that soul shall be cut off<WH3772> from among<WH7130> his people<WH5971>.

Six <WH8337> days<WH3117> shall work<WH4399> be done<WH6213>; but on the seventh<WH7637> day is a sabbath<WH7676> of solemn rest<WH7677>, holy<WH6944> to Jehovah<WH3068>; whosoever doeth<WH6213> any work<WH4399> on the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117>, he shall surely<WH4191> be put to death<WH4191>.

Wherefore the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall keep<WH8104> the sabbath<WH7676>, to observe<WH6213> the sabbath<WH7676> throughout their generations<WH1755>, for a perpetual<WH5769> covenant<WH1285>.

It is a sign<WH226> between me and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> for ever<WH5769>: for in six<WH8337> days<WH3117> Jehovah<WH3068> made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776>, and on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> he rested<WH7673>, and was refreshed<WH5314>.

And he gave<WH5414> unto Moses<WH4872>, when he had made an end<WH3615> of communing<WH1696> with him upon mount<WH2022> Sinai<WH5514>, the two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of the testimony<WH5715>, tables<WH3871> of stone<WH68>, written<WH3789> with the finger<WH676> of God<WH430>.
